allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$ErrorActionPreference=''Stop''; Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Drawing; $path=''C:\Users\USER\Desktop\floweat\public\examples\sample-meal.jpg''; $img=[System.Drawing.Image]::FromFile($path); $img.RotateFlip([System.Drawing.RotateFlipType]::Rotate180FlipNone); $img.Save($path); $img.Dispose(); Write-Host ''Image rotated successfully''")
